info.brief_description: You obtain the powers of a ditto! Shapeshift into anything!
info.description:
You had gone to your friend Bill's house to help him on his new experiment he's been working on. Bill was trying to succeed in fixing his teleportation machine. In the past it was just to teleport one person, now he is trying to have two organisms on each teleportation pad and make them trade places. When you get to Bill's house he has you stand on one platform and places his ditto on the other platform. With the two of you in place he flips the switch to start the machine...

You have the powers of a ditto from the anime; which means you can transform into objects as well.

I'm not a fan of stink stories like turning into a shoe so try not to make the only option that.

Try to make it so that whoever you interact with doesnt know you have the shapeshifting powers.
